diseases.name: Acne
diseases.symptoms: Pimples, blackheads, whiteheads, inflammation, redness, pain
diseases.causes: Excess oil production, bacteria, hormonal changes, stress, diet
diseases.treatment: Topical treatments (benzoyl peroxide, salicylic acid), antibiotics, retinoids, lifestyle changes
diseases.prevention: Regular cleansing, avoiding oily products, managing stress, healthy diet

diseases.name: Eczema
diseases.symptoms: Dry, itchy skin, red patches, inflammation, scaling, cracking
diseases.causes: Genetic factors, environmental triggers, immune system dysfunction, allergies
diseases.treatment: Moisturizers, topical steroids, antihistamines, avoiding triggers
diseases.prevention: Regular moisturizing, avoiding harsh soaps, managing stress, identifying triggers
diseases.common_locations: Hands, feet, face, inside of elbows, behind knees

diseases.name: Psoriasis
diseases.symptoms: Thick, red patches with silvery scales, itching, burning, soreness
diseases.causes: Immune system dysfunction, genetic factors, stress, infections
diseases.treatment: Topical treatments, light therapy, systemic medications, biologics
diseases.prevention: Stress management, avoiding triggers, maintaining healthy lifestyle

diseases.name: Rosacea
diseases.symptoms: Facial redness, visible blood vessels, bumps, eye irritation
diseases.causes: Genetic factors, environmental triggers, blood vessel abnormalities
diseases.treatment: Topical medications, oral antibiotics, laser therapy, lifestyle changes
diseases.prevention: Avoiding triggers, sun protection, gentle skincare

diseases.name: Melanoma
diseases.symptoms: Irregular moles, changes in existing moles, dark spots, itching
diseases.causes: UV exposure, genetic factors, fair skin, multiple moles
diseases.treatment: Surgical removal, immunotherapy, targeted therapy, chemotherapy
diseases.prevention: Sun protection, regular skin checks, avoiding tanning beds
diseases.common_locations: Anywhere on the body, often sun-exposed areas
